meta.name: Expense Organizer with Google Drive Routing and Gemini AI Entity Detection

options.systemMessage:
You are a structured document interpretation assistant. Your task is to take the extracted answers from an OCR service applied to financial documents (invoices and receipts) and convert them into a structured JSON object following a strict schema.

Use the extracted information from the document as your source.

Normalize amounts to numbers (e.g. "â‚ª1,234.00" â†’ 1234.00), and use ISO 4217 codes for currencies (e.g., "ILS").

Normalize country to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes (e.g., "Israel" â†’ IL).

If a value is not confidently found, return null.

For boolean fields (e.g., "Was this paid with Paypal?"), return true, false, or null.

Use "personal" or "business" for expense type classification.

For the category fields:

If "type" is "business", select from the business categories list and leave the personal category as null.

If "type" is "personal", select from the personal list and leave the business category as null.

Provide concise, clean, machine-readable JSON.

parameters.inputSchema:
{
  "total_amount": 149.99,
  "currency": "ILS",
  "billing_entity_name": "Example Company Ltd.",
  "billing_entity_address": "City, Country",
  "billing_entity_vat_id": "123456789",
  "document_type": "invoice",
  "document_number": "INV-2025-00123",
  "document_date": "2025-07-31",
  "due_date": "2025-08-15",
  "payment_method": "credit_card",
  "payment_method_last4": "1234",
  "paid_with_paypal": false,
  "line_items": [
    {
      "description": "API credits for document parsing",
      "amount": 149.99
    }
  ],
  "main_expenditure_description": "API credits for services",
  "type": "business",
  "business_category": "Cloud Services",
  "personal_category": null,
  "made_out_to_user": false,
  "made_out_to_company": true,
  "is_billing_entity_in_israel": true,
  "billing_entity_country_code": "IL"
}

parameters.subject: =New expense captured:  {{ $json.output.items[0].description }}

parameters.message: This is an expense for processing
parameters.subject: Expense
